sentence.Network_en: Mandela said, "We want a united, undivided South Africa".

sentence.Network_en: The paintings she produced in those months won undivided admiration.
sentence.Network_cn: 她那几个月里创作的画作备受推崇。

sentence.Network_en: Adults rarely give the television their undivided attention.
sentence.Network_cn: 成年人很少会专心地看电视。

entry.def: If you give someone or something your undivided attention, you concentrate on them fully and do not think about anything else.

example.ex: Eldest children are the only ones to have experienced the undivided attention of their parents...
example.tran: 只有老大得到过父母一心一意的照顾。

example.ex: Adults rarely give the television their undivided attention.
example.tran: 成年人很少会专心地看电视。

entry.def: Undivided feelings are ones that are very strong and not mixed with other feelings.

example.ex: The paintings she produced in those months won undivided admiration...
example.tran: 她那几个月里创作的画作备受推崇。

entry.tran: （国家或组织）统一的，未分裂的
entry.def: An undivided country or organization is one that is not separated into smaller parts or groups.

example.ex: Mandela said, 'We want a united, undivided South Africa'.
example.tran: 曼德拉说道：“我们想要一个团结统一的南非。”
一统基督教教会的目标

means.word_mean: 1. not parted by conflict of opinion;
2. not shared by or among others;
3. not divided among or brought to bear on more than one object or objective;

sentences.sentence: "judging a contest with a single eye"

means.word_mean: 4. not separated into parts or shares; constituting an undivided unit;

auth_sentence.content: Jerusalem will remain undivided and at most shared.

sentences.en: Students are listening with undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 学生们正在专心地听讲。

sentences.en: I’ll just finish writing this sentence, and then you can have my undivided attention.
sentences.cn: 让我先把这句话写完，我就可以全心全意招呼你了。
